message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle at $150?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to go a bit lower? I'm willing to compromise at $155.
I'm not willing to go as low as $155, but I can see you're serious about the product. I'll counter with $162, which is a bit lower than my previous offer, but still a good deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit, but I'm still not comfortable with $162. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and compromise at $158. Can you consider that?

I'm not willing to go as low as $158, but I can see you're really interested in the product. I'll make one more counteroffer: $164. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for both of us.
I understand that you're willing to go as low as $164, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise at $160. Can you consider that?

I'm not willing to go as low as $160, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'll make one more counteroffer: $165, but I'm only willing to go this low because I think the product is really worth it to you. This is my final offer.
